version.description: The version of the metadata schema in use. For example '1.0.2'.

agency.description: The agency acronym for Clinger Cohen Act agency, as defined by the United States Government Manual.

releases.description: An object containing each versioned source code project made available

organization.description: The organization within the agency that the releases listed belong to. For example, '18F' or 'Navy'.

description.description: A one- or two-sentence description of the release.

URL.description: The URL of the project license, if available. null should be used if not.

name.description: an abbreviation for the name of the type license. For example, 'CC0' or 'MIT'.

usageType.description: A list of enumerated values which describes the usage or license permissions for the release.

exemptionText.description: If an exemption is listed in the 'usageType' field, this field should include a one- or two- sentence justification for any exemption used.

items.description: An array of keywords describing the release.

email.description: The email address for the point of contact for the release.

name.description: The name of the point of contact for the release.

URL.description: The URL to a website that can be used reach the point of contact. For example, 'http://twitter.com/codeDotGov'

phone.description: A phone number for the point of contact for the release.

status.description: The development status of the release.

vcs.description: A lowercase string with the name of the version control system in use on the project.

repositoryURL.description: The URL of the public project repository for open source repositories. This field is not required for repositories that are only available as government-wide reuse or are closed, pursuant to one of the exemptions.

homepageURL.description: The URL of the public release homepage.

downloadURL.description: The URL where a distribution of the release can be found.

languagues.description: An array of strings with the names of the programming languages in use on the release.

laborHours.description: The total number of labor hours spent on the development of this release.

method.description: An enumerated list of different methods for measuring the open source requurement.

ifOther.description: A one- or two- sentence description of the measurement type used, if 'other' is selected as the value of 'method' field.

partners.description: An array of objects including an acronym for each agency partnering on the release and the contact email at such agency.

name.description: The acronym describing the partner agency.

email.description: The email address for the point of contact at the partner agency.

date.description: A date object describing the release.

created.description: The date the release was created, in YYYY-MM-DD or ISO 8601 format.

lastModified.description: The date the release was modified, in YYYY-MM-DD or ISO 8601 format.

metadataLastUpdated.description: The date the metadata of the release was last updated, in YYYY-MM-DD or ISO 8601 format.
